title: Ottawa: reflection of a nation
brief_description: Canada’s capital city is viewed here in its spring-time splendour. A colorful parade of the Guards on Parliament Hill, the escort of an ambassador in coach-and-four, and away from the pageantry the wildlife refuge of Gatineau Park are featured.
description: Canada’s capital city is viewed here in its spring-time splendour. A colorful parade of the Guards on Parliament Hill, the escort of an ambassador in coach-and-four, and away from the pageantry the wildlife refuge of Gatineau Park are featured.
